title: Emerald Radiance Jhumkas - Pachala Raalla Jhumka
materials: and meticulously set Cubic Zirconia (CZ) diamonds. The gold is finished with a Hyderabadi polish to give a luxurious luster.
features: These exquisite Jhumkas feature a classic South Indian-inspired design with a contemporary twist. The prominent Emeralds add a touch of opulence, while the intricate filigree work showcases meticulous craftsmanship. The square Emerald is used at the top and the pear shaped Emeralds are used in the Jhumka design. The intricate design is embedded with CZ diamonds to enhance the beauty of the piece.The floral patterns and delicate detailing make them a stunning statement piece.
occasions: or as a show-stopping accessory for a special evening event.
description: These Jhumkas offer a harmonious blend of traditional South Indian artistry and modern elegance. The vibrant Emeralds are believed to bring prosperity and good fortune, making them not only beautiful but also auspicious. The high-quality materials and expert craftsmanship ensure lasting beauty and value. The CZ stones add a modern shimmer, making it suitable for both traditional and contemporary wardrobes.
